hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOIP.EOIP_ID, EOIP.CREATOR, EOIP.CREATE_TIME, EOIP.MODIFIER, EOIP.MODIFY_TIME, EOIP.REC_VER, EOIP.REC_STATUS, EOIP.ORG_ID, EOIP.TIME_ZONE, EOIP.PM_CODE, EOIP.EOIP_NAME, EOIP.EOIP_NAME_EN, EOIP.EOIP_REMARK, EOIP.EOIP_PRIORITY, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_CREATOR_NAME, ESUSM.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_MODIFIER_NAME, EOIP.EOIP_TYPE from EO_ISSUED_PARAM EOIP LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EOIP.CREATOR = ESUS.ESUS_ID LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUSM ON EOIP.MODIFIER = ESUSM.ESUS_ID where 1=1 <<and EOIP.EOIP_ID = :eoipId>> <<and EOIP.CREATOR = :creator>> <<and EOIP.CREATE_TIME = :createTime>> <<and EOIP.MODIFIER = :modifier>> <<and EOIP.MODIFY_TIME = :modifyTime>> <<and EOIP.REC_VER = :recVer>> <<and EOIP.REC_STATUS = :recStatus>> <<and EOIP.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<and EOIP.TIME_ZONE = :timeZone>> <<and EOIP.PM_CODE = :pmCode>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_NAME = :eoipName>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_NAME_EN = :eoipNameEn>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_REMARK = :eoipRemark>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_PRIORITY = :eoipPriority>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_NAME IN (:eoipNames)>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_ID NOT IN (:eoipIds)>> <<and EOIP.EOIP_TYPE LIKE :eoipType>> order by EOIP.EOIP_PRIORITY asc
